text: Southern England, UK. Data Visualisation/Web Interface. We are looking for someone (for a short contract) who can code the visualization of live data on an SQL database. In essence a visual 'traffic light system' to display the live data on a web page with drill down to detail. Possible technology to be used include pChart, PHP/SWF, amCharts or Open Flash. Interested? Then please get in touch. robbie@emmtek.co.uk
